snippet: HOFFMAN--Miriam. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Miriam Hoffman, who leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Miriam's beloved children, Alan (Nancy) and Stacy; and to the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
